Posts.Content: Hi Carol.  Thank you for replying.   I have gained a few Kilos. I think it's the sugar cravings. Because when I feel sick I found shortbread and flapjacks helped before I took my steroids as I was feeling sick I could not take the pills. Then on.my third week I had a cooking spree cooking cakes and cheesecake. I don't know how to stop that craving. I hope after this second infusion I don't crave sugar.  Looking back on it I see I was mental to do that. Lesson learned I think.  Hope you are doing ok. Thanks again Bev x
Posts.Title: Weight gain on chemo

Posts.Content: Hi Thank you for replying. How much weight did you put on if you don't mind asking. I am too overweight and find hard to shift it. So putting more weight on is terrifying me. I heard some one put on 5 stone  Regards Bev x
Posts.Title: Weight gain on chemo

Posts.Content: Hi Julia Also thank you for inspiration. I.hope that I can nip the weight gain in the bud. I'm 82kg and have got my self in a rut over the last couple of years gave up the gym. I was 61kgs then and it has just spiralled.  So now the thought of adding more weight scares me to death.  I do hope I can conquer the weight gain.  If you all can do it then I know I can and must x Bevx
Posts.Title: Weight gain on chemo

Posts.Content: Hi dear all.  I hope you are all keeping well and spirits high x I am in a dilemma.  I go for second FEC Today and not looking forward to it as it's a long journey with the cold cap. But have to do what ever is in my power be looking like me as much as possible. Please has anyone gained so much weight on chemo  I am dreaded in this most of all I think because I feel it is nothing I can do about it. Or is there.? I have suffered with weight since I was 20 and I hate putting the weight on as I can battle and battle to get it off as I feel I am not in control with anything anymore.   I have been told the steroid are the culprit for this. Has anyone dieted whilst on chemo? Unfortunately the only diet that's worked for me in the past is shake meals with evening cooked meal.dont know if it is allowed. Do any of you go exercise too?  Has anyone battled with weight and managed to prevent it while on chemo. I would be absolutely appreciate your support and advice. Will love Bev thank you all and speedy recovery to all xx
Posts.Title: Weight gain on chemo

Posts.Content: Hi Julia. Thank.you so much for your advice. I must admit since being diagnosed cancer in December I have not done any expertise.  Partly because I had two ops sinc January and then the chemo started. Had my second FEC yesterday and swore to myself that as soon as I feel up to it I will walk on my treadmill that is collecting dust. Even if for only 10 mins I know I will feel the benefit. It's just making that move. As for the shakes I. Think you are probably right and try to to it the right way as and when I can eat. I.really appreciate the advice and I hope to be in a health position just like you as soon as I can. Bev x
Posts.Title: Weight gain on chemo

Posts.Content: Hi all Thank you for all your responses it has helped me a lot.  Possitive onwards that's all i can say for us all.  Thank.you so much  Bevx
Posts.Title: Weight gain on chemo

Posts.Content: Hi all again. I.have a question. Does or did anyone get really swollen tummy on chemo? My first one and this one my tummy swelled and hard looks like I'm 9 months pregnant. Even my sister said I do:-(.  Is this normal?  Bev x
Posts.Title: Weight gain on chemo

Posts.Content: Hi Maggi.  Thank.ypu very helpful. I am.drinking now sparkling water with squash or lemon juice just to c lease the palette to feel fresher.  I am trying to eat what ever I fancy regardless of the taste just so I know that I am eating something I want even though can't really taste it. Thanks again Bev x
Posts.Title: Sore mouth

Posts.Content: Hi all. I just wanted to know if your mouth is sore and horrid after every time you have chemo. I have had my first one last week and was wondering is this expected every time or does it only happen on the first time.  I am using Corsodyl but not sure if this is the best one. Is it normal to have no taste and a permanent bland taste in mouth.:-( can't enjoy any food as none of it actually taste like food.  Any tips would be welcome. Bev x
Posts.Title: Sore mouth

Posts.Content: Hi All. Thank you for all your advice. I will have to try all to see what's best. I woke this morning feeling like I have a head cold coming and don't know whether I should take paracetamol.  Take care all x
Posts.Title: Sore mouth

Posts.Content: Hi Carol. Thank you for that. I'm afraid I don't drink enough and I know I should. I will try harder.  I suffer also from high blood pressure. Does chemo also make your head feel full of pressure ? Thank you Bev x
Posts.Title: Sore mouth

Posts.Content: Thanks Carol It's hard to know what is expected and what I should call about as you don't know if this is part and parcel of all side effects. Will try better with water had no beer yet though lol don't want to waste the taste. Love Bev X
Posts.Title: Sore mouth

Posts.Content: Thank you Susie.  At least I know this is what to expect each time.  Bev X
Posts.Title: Sore mouth

Posts.Content: Hi Maria. Thank you for your answer. So I have a few more days like this then hopefully will be better. Just feel trapped in doors because to painful to drive. Sorry have you finished the T? Was it worse each session or is it just the first one because it's a different chemo?  Bev x
Posts.Title: Docetexal

Posts.Content: Hi sarah and Marie. Thank you for replies. At least I have a rough idea of what to expect now.  Hope all goes well for the next T for you. Mine is on the 26th Bev xx
Posts.Title: Docetexal

Posts.Content: Hi all.  Thank.you for your comments much appreciate. Wanderer ... really sorry you had a really bad time I hope mine is not so bad. I am stopping the tramadol because of the effects it gives me. I will try other drugs especially for next time. This is now day 8 and the pains are still there. To top it all I am coming out with spots or cuts which ever they are and one is getting infected and pussy. So a new side effect that no one has mentioned yet.  I will have to see GP for this and hope they have something that works. Again thank.you and Wanderer good luck with a mammogram.  I also had news today which upset me is my sisters mother in law is diagnosed with brain cancer. She is 84. The sad thing is she has mastectomy and chemo and rads last year and was getting better. But sadly a new cancer has got her this year. So.she opted out of treatment as it is far too aggressive and she can't take any more treatment. So what I am saying to all is good luck and find good health because you just don't know what is round the corner... Love to all Bev x
Posts.Title: Docetexal

Posts.Content: Hello everyone. I hope you are feeling better. I have mentioned before about dieting. I was wondering if anyone has been doing or is doing slimming world or weight watchers.  I would love to hear from all of you and any tips if you are as I am thinking of joining as I keep adding 3 kgs on the first week of chemo then by the 3rd we I may lose 2kgs. But by the time I get zapped again I'm back to square one. So if any of you are doing these diets while on chemo I would appreciate some help to decide whether to join or not. I am into my second chemo fec and will be on the last fec in two weeks. Then 3 more T to go....So I would like to get a head start while I can eat and not feel sick. I look forward to hearing from you lovely people  Live and wishes  Bev x
Posts.Title: Slimming world/ weightwatchers while on Chemo??

Posts.Content: Hi Steve and Charlotte. Thank you. I thought as much that it would be ok as like you say it is not a crash diet.  I will look into this and also speak to my OC doctor when I go In two weeks time.  I have been told that the last three chemo I receive I am likely to put weight on due to the steroids.  So ideally I would like to loose a bit before the dreaded drug.  Thanks again Bev xx
Posts.Title: Slimming world/ weightwatchers while on Chemo??

Posts.Content: Thank you too you all. Very helpful. I think I will wait until the chemo is finished and go on SW  Like you say you get no taste and appetite on chemo it is on and off so i would not be able to follow the plan. I have however been making veg and fruit smoothies one a day so that at least I am getting some nutrients if I don't fancy food.  Good health to.you all  Love Bev xx
Posts.Title: Slimming world/ weightwatchers while on Chemo??

Posts.Content: Hi. Thank you both that's very helpful at least I know roughly when It may start to kick in if I get them.  I have been given oromorph so I suppose I can take that if the pain is unbearable. Thank you again Bev x
Posts.Title: Docetexal

Posts.Content: Hi Karen Thank u for the advice. My OC did give me diflam I don't know if that will help. If not I will try the bicarb if it starts.  Lethargic today although no sickness like I did with fec. So I hope I don't get that again. Bev x
Posts.Title: Docetexal

Posts.Content: Hi all.  Hope you are well. I went to doctors yesterday because of the bone pain which I might add is not giving me any respite. Doctor gave me Tramadol. Although taking two with paracetamol and ibrufen as per scribed by doctor. It did help alot.  Through the night however I had weird feeling of drunkenness and woozy. Don't know if this is normal or whether it was the tablet. I have not taken any this morning as I have also had a bad head and making me feel sick. Again don't know if this is normal or the tablet  Is anyone taking this painkiller and are you having simular effects. Otherwise will have to go back to GP I guess. I also am breaking out in spots on my shoulder and one is pussing  ( sorry not nice) ;-( because I don't heal now it hurts white alot. I must say I prefer the FEC and the sickness that goes with this than I do the T. Seems to have knocked me for 6 and doesn't seem to be a light at the tunnel this week.  Feel so Crap  Bev
Posts.Title: Docetexal

Posts.Content: Hi all I hope you are all keeping well. I received the T for first time yesterday. Was a horrible let time I was vomiting :-( Thank goodness the nausea has gone. I was just wondering how soon the bone aches start answer sore hands and feet. Answer most of all the sore mouth. I did not get any soreness with the fec. Thanks for looking and advising  Love Bev x
Posts.Title: Docetexal

Posts.Content: Thanks Fiona and Marie. Sounds like fun to look forward too. So glad ur feeling more alive Marie. Wish I did today. Hate being cooped up indoors when the weather is nice but don't even have the strength to get dressed.  Getting a bit of nose bleed today so I guess like people say it's the no nose hairs that are not there are not helping.  Hay ho only 2 more T to go. Thank you all for support don't know what I would do with out you all sharing your ups and downs. Love Bev x
Posts.Title: Docetexal

Posts.Content: Hi kazzymoo I don't envy you having to have the rads. I don't think I will be having that as I lost all breast and tissue. But be very hard when you have children to look after.  I live on my own I find that hard as you have to make yourself cook or do stuff around.  My taste is out the window. I even try hot chili sauce on food to get something but makes u not want to bother as u just can't appreciate the food. I so fancy roast lamb tomorrow but don't see the point of cooking it.  I have painted my nails dark red so hoping they don't fall off. Hands and feet are a little sensitive to heat in the water when u wash up and bath so that's not so nice.  But yes we're alive and that is the most important thing. Then wen we have all finished we can crackers a bottle of champers to celebrate Bev x
Posts.Title: Docetexal

Posts.Content: Hi all.  Update on my first T. Feel really rubbish.. had it on Thursday and the bone aches started later Saturday.  I had to take oromorph for the pain as the paracetamol and ibrufen would not touch the pain at all :-( and the stuff made me constipated since saturday that I can't go. All my fingernails ache too is that normal? I was wondering when the aches start to subside.  Can't sleep legs get the jitters and throb constantly. I thought it only lasted 24 hrs. Sorry for winging but this is the lowest I have felt and all I want to do is cry. I expect it's normal. I just can't find a comfortable place to lay or sit. To scared to eat more as nothing coming out :-( ( sorry) to much info lol ... tried smoothies and poo shakes and pills. What a mess :-)  Any inspiration to boost me will be nice to hear. I hope you all are doing better.  I will promise to be more cheerful next time  Bev xx
Posts.Title: Docetexal
